name: 20th International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering
content: 20th International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering, scheduled during May 25-26, 2020 at Osaka, Japan, is a full-day event being curated by eminent speakers, scientists, students, and other audiences. Our goal is to bring together bright minds to give talks that are idea-focused, and on a wide range of subjects to learn, inspire and provoke conversations.
